title: Jill Zarin on Housewife History, Sherri Papini’s Kidnap Reveal
description:
Heather read the 55-page affidavit arrest warrant for Sherri Papini who faked her own kidnapping. Her former boyfriend told the police everything, including that they never had sex but he did go to Hobby Lobby for her. Real Housewife of New York, Jill Zarin is in LA and plays the game What Would Jill Zarin Do? Heather put Jill in some of the craziest Housewife moments and storylines and asked W.W.J.Z.D.? In this episode, she reveals so much scoop, you won’t know what to do with all the info on fellow castmates, housewives from other franchises, and the Bravo producers. 

Subscribe on Apple Podcasts to get exclusive Extra Juicy episodes every Friday and get all episodes of Juicy Scoop, ad-free
